official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to change the position of the Director of the Census Bureau to level IV from level V in the Executive Schedule.

summary.text: Changes the position of the Director of the Bureau of the Census from level V to level IV in the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to change the position of the Director of the Census Bureau to level IV from level V in the Executive Schedule.
